function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Incomplete context for numerical values","Impact":"Misinterpretation of data or incorrect analysis","Mitigation":"Provide clear labels and context for numerical values","Technologies":"Data visualization tools","People":"Researchers, analysts, and decision-makers","Owner":"Data providers"},{"Description":"Data entry errors","Impact":"Inaccurate analysis and conclusions","Mitigation":"Double-check data entry for accuracy and consistency","Technologies":"Automated data validation tools","People":"Data entry personnel and analysts","Owner":"Data providers"},{"Description":"Incomplete source information","Impact":"Difficulty in verifying data authenticity and reliability","Mitigation":"Provide complete source information for reference","Technologies":"Blockchain technology for data provenance","People":"Researchers, analysts, and data consumers","Owner":"Data providers"}]}
